channel.title: Having trouble loading deltascape client
channel.description:
Everytime I try to load a deltascape client I download I always get the following error...
[code]Could not find the main class. Program will exit.[/code]
Here is the code for my run.bat...
[code]@echo off @CD ./Bin/ start javaw -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 @Exit[/code]
It should work but doesn't? Any ideas on to what might be wrong? Please help.

item.title: Having trouble loading deltascape client
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

@Echo off
echo You May now close this window, thanks.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe” -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
@echo off
exit

Try using that one but if you have something like EGUI instead of Gui change the Gui part to EGUI

Read full topic
